special_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, draw a card.
[-2]: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Creature spells you cast this turn enter with an additional +1/+1 counter on them for each color of mana spent to cast them.
Draw a card.
